comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

pull_request.title: Fix #127568 www.mcbbs.net
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request > Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\ > If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\ > It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/en/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\ > Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it ## Prerequisites ### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms - [x] This is not an ad/bug report; - [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project; - [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes; - [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure. ## What problem does the pull request fix? ### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section - [x] Missed ads or ad leftovers; - [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly; - [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website; - [ ] Missed analytics or tracker; - [ ] Social media buttons share, like, tweet, etc; - [ ] Annoyances pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc; - [ ] Filters maintenance. ## What issue is being fixed? ### Enter the issue address Fix #127568 ### Add your comment and screenshots #### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located 0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\ Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\ Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content; 1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard Use `
` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler; 2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know. **Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots! 1. Your comment Removed the ad banner 2. Screenshots
Screenshot 1 (Before): ![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/0966d75c2792b8dfad0277ff62aa2ae86a5f43da363021c6b19692d0d511e50d/68747470733a2f2f7265706f7274732d696d672e616467756172642e636f6d2f694d33727669692e706e67)
Screenshot 2 (After):
### Terms - [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

Cannot reproduce with your settings. 
Please try to disable-enable content blockers in Safari settings and restart Safari, and check for filters update.
Do not close AdGuard window ~60 seconds, because iOS will breaks configuration process.

If it didn't help, please reboot the phone.

comment.body:
> > Con el filtro mencionado habilitado, la pgina no funciona correctamente. En [uBlockOrigin/uAssets#14490](https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/issues/14490) yo mismo he reportado el problema y hay detalles adicionales de ste y del elemento que est provocando el error.

With the mentioned filter enabled, the page does not work properly. In [uBlockOrigin/uAssets#14490](https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/issues/14490) I have reported the problem myself and there are additional details of it and the element that is causing the error.

Tested on Chrome, Firefox, and Edge on Windows.

Please, feel free to go to the mentioned github issue or ask for additional details.

Thanks!

comment.body: Opened the popup display so that you can close it by tapping it. Unfortunately, AdGuard Content Blocker has limited functionality. To completely block this element, it is better to install [AdGuard for Android](https://adguard.com/ru/adguard-android/overview.html).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request


## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

Adds some URL tracking parameters. Namely:
- s_cid

- __hssc
- __hstc
- _hsenc
- hsCtaTracking

issue.title: live.bilibili.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin 1.43.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://live.bilibili.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard URL Tracking filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment> Go to https://live.bilibili.com find any room having a banner (see screenshot 1) on its cover. This means the room is making a lottery.
2. <comment> After entering such room, there'll be a lottery icon (see screenshot 2) on the left side under the player.
3. <comment> Click it will popup a lottery window (see screenshot 3).
4. <comment> When the rule is enabled, the lottery popup window has a large shadow background (see screenshot 4), and the bottons (join or close) are not clickable. Have to refresh the webpage to make the window disappear. Or disable this rule then every thing will be fine. https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/eb7c3a5c44ab70a28e85c10ab6f7bb5407f29ebd/TrackParamFilter/sections/specific.txt#L763
5. <comment> remove param `from` should be applied **except** live.bilibili.com

6. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![lottery room](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/84114630/184405688-51836545-dcf8-4702-8d3e-9b8111990a27.png)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 2:</summary>

![lottery icon](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/84114630/184405839-abf2be7e-c18a-4430-baa6-46885b8b4685.png)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 3:</summary>

![normal lottery popup window](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/84114630/184407459-4ebc3970-2f7d-4d20-916f-74047b53b0e7.png)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 4:</summary>

![error lottery popup window](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/84114630/184406272-946669e2-8984-48c7-96d2-2c558be94397.png)

</details>

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin 1.43.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://live.bilibili.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard URL Tracking filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment> Go to https://live.bilibili.com find any room having a banner (see screenshot 1) on its cover. This means the room is making a lottery.
2. <comment> After entering such room, there'll be a lottery icon (see screenshot 2) on the left side under the player.
3. <comment> Click it will popup a lottery window (see screenshot 3).
4. <comment> When the rule is enabled, the lottery popup window has a large shadow background (see screenshot 4), and the bottons (join or close) are not clickable. Have to refresh the webpage to make the window disappear. Or disable this rule then every thing will be fine. https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/eb7c3a5c44ab70a28e85c10ab6f7bb5407f29ebd/TrackParamFilter/sections/specific.txt#L763
5. <comment> remove param `from` should be applied **except** live.bilibili.com
